body:
Day 10 - Manga 243*
Pretty good.
6/10.
Also, I ain't saying much in these last ones because, firstly, I don't understand the story and second, sometimes the art is so shitty that I don't know what to say.
This one, for example, while the art is pretty good, a bit of refining is needed since some faces that the characters make seem exaggerated.
Good art but the ending sorta killed it 5/10
It was good in the beginning but idk what the fuck happened after that 4/10
